Package com.craigwoodcock.fishingapp.controller

package com.craigwoodcock.fishingapp.controller
Root controller package for the Fishing Application that manages all HTTP request handling.

This package is organized into two main subpackages:

  • apiController - Handles REST API endpoints returning JSON/XML responses
  • webController - Handles web interface endpoints returning view templates

Common functionality and base classes for both API and web controllers are placed in this root package. The separation between API and web controllers allows for clear distinction between REST API endpoints and traditional web page handlers.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Craig Woodcock
